001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidArgumentFunctionException;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyUriItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDecimalItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IUntypedAtomicItem;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
022
023import java.util.List;
024import java.util.Map;
025import java.util.stream.Collectors;
026import java.util.stream.Stream;
027
028import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
029import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
030
031/**
032 * Implements the XPath 3.1
033 * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-min">fn:min</a> and
034 * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-max">fn:max</a>
035 * functions.
036 */
037public final class FnMinMax {
038  private static final String NAME_MIN = "min";
039  private static final String NAME_MAX = "max";
040
041  @NonNull
042  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_MIN = IFunction.builder()
043      .name(NAME_MIN)
044      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
045      .deterministic()
046      .contextIndependent()
047      .focusIndependent()
048      .argument(IArgument.builder()
049          .name("arg")
050          .type(IAnyAtomicItem.class)
051          .zeroOrMore()
052          .build())
053      .returnType(IAnyAtomicItem.class)
054      .returnZeroOrOne()
055      .functionHandler(FnMinMax::executeMin)
056      .build();
057
058  @NonNull
059  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_MAX = IFunction.builder()
060      .name(NAME_MAX)
061      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
062      .deterministic()
063      .contextIndependent()
064      .focusIndependent()
065      .argument(IArgument.builder()
066          .name("arg")
067          .type(IAnyAtomicItem.class)
068          .zeroOrMore()
069          .build())
070      .returnType(IAnyAtomicItem.class)
071      .returnZeroOrOne()
072      .functionHandler(FnMinMax::executeMax)
073      .build();
074
075  private FnMinMax() {
076    // disable construction
077  }
078
079  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
080  @NonNull
081  private static ISequence<IAnyAtomicItem> executeMin(
082      @NonNull IFunction function,
083      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
084      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
085      IItem focus) {
086    ISequence<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> sequence = FunctionUtils.asType(
087        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
088
089    return ISequence.of(min(sequence.getValue()));
090  }
091
092  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
093  @NonNull
094  private static ISequence<IAnyAtomicItem> executeMax(
095      @NonNull IFunction function,
096      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
097      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
098      IItem focus) {
099    ISequence<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> sequence = FunctionUtils.asType(
100        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
101
102    return ISequence.of(max(sequence.getValue()));
103  }
104
105  /**
106   * An implementation of XPath 3.1
107   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-min">fn:min</a>.
108   *
109   * @param items
110   *          the items to find the minimum value for
111   * @return the average
112   */
113  @Nullable
114  public static IAnyAtomicItem min(@NonNull List<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> items) {
115    return normalize(items)
116        .min((item1, item2) -> {
117          assert item2 != null;
118          return item1.compareTo(item2);
119        })
120        .orElse(null);
121  }
122
123  /**
124   * An implementation of XPath 3.1
125   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-max">fn:max</a>.
126   *
127   * @param items
128   *          the items to find the maximum value for
129   * @return the average
130   */
131  @Nullable
132  public static IAnyAtomicItem max(@NonNull List<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> items) {
133    return normalize(items)
134        .max((item1, item2) -> {
135          assert item2 != null;
136          return item1.compareTo(item2);
137        })
138        .orElse(null);
139  }
140
141  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.OnlyOneReturn") // readability
142  private static Stream<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> normalize(
143      @NonNull List<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> items) {
144    if (items.isEmpty()) {
145      return Stream.empty();
146    }
147
148    if (items.size() == 1) {
149      return Stream.of(items.get(0));
150    }
151
152    List<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> resultingItems = ObjectUtils.notNull(items.stream()
153        .map(item -> item instanceof IUntypedAtomicItem ? IDecimalItem.cast(item) : item)
154        .collect(Collectors.toList()));
155
156    Map<Class<? extends IAnyAtomicItem>, Integer> counts = FunctionUtils.countTypes(
157        IAnyAtomicItem.PRIMITIVE_ITEM_TYPES,
158        resultingItems);
159
160    Stream<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> stream = null;
161    if (counts.size() == 1) {
162      stream = resultingItems.stream();
163    } else if (counts.size() > 1) {
164      int size = resultingItems.size();
165      if (counts.getOrDefault(IStringItem.class, 0) + counts.getOrDefault(IAnyUriItem.class, 0) == size) {
166        stream = resultingItems.stream()
167            .map(IAnyAtomicItem::asStringItem);
168      } else if (counts.getOrDefault(IDecimalItem.class, 0) == size) {
169        stream = resultingItems.stream()
170            .map(item -> (IDecimalItem) item);
171      }
172    }
173
174    if (stream == null) {
175      throw new InvalidArgumentFunctionException(
176          InvalidArgumentFunctionException.INVALID_ARGUMENT_TYPE,
177          String.format("Values must all be of a single atomic type. Their types are '%s'.",
178              FunctionUtils.getTypes(resultingItems).stream()
179                  .map(Class::getName)
180                  .collect(Collectors.joining(","))));
181    }
182    return stream;
183  }
184}
